changelog: First release with all maps, items and locations present with AP autotracking.
- Collecting Baggage reduces the count of the corresponding Baggage Tag when collected so that the Tag count matches the number of tags of that type in Raz's inventory.
- The total count of Camper Brains is automatically increased when a Brain is collected. The specific found/missing Brains can be seen in the Brains tab.
Adds accessible, but out-of-logic access (yellow locations)
Out-of-logic access can be turned off in the Pack Settings (between Broadcast View and AP autotracking toggle), turning all yellow locations red instead.
